title: Killing the Same Person Every Time - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Cute Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Triangles   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Obsessive Love   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Resurrection   R*pe   System Administrator   World Hopping   Yandere
author: Tan Chen   檀尘
description:
How do you kill a villain that is better than you in every aspect? 

According to Bu Bai, there is only one step: Make him fall in love with you.

But, what he had never thought about was that there was still another step: Letting yourself fall in love with him.

Bu Bai: “I came to kill you.”

Villain: “I came because I love you.”>
